scripts.setup: cp scripts/pre-commit .git/hooks/ && chmod +x .git/hooks/pre-commit && echo 'Git hooks set'
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/* && rm -rf docs/* && mkdir -p docs && mkdir -p dist
scripts.build: npm run clean && vite build --base=./ && cp -r dist/* docs
scripts.release: rm -r docs && yarn build:github && git add docs && git commit -m "Update release"
